00053     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00054     // Termination handler
00055     extern "C" _OgreExport void handleTerminate(void)
00056     {
00057         Root& r = Root::getSingleton();
00058 
00059         r.shutdown();
00060 
00061         ErrorDialog* dlg;
00062 
00063         dlg = PlatformManager::getSingleton().createErrorDialog();
00064 
00065         Exception* e = Exception::getLastException();
00066 
00067         if (e)
00068             dlg->display(e->getFullDescription());
00069         else
00070             dlg->display("Unknown");
00071 
00072         // Abort
00073         exit(-1);
00074 
00075     }
00076 
00077     void Root::termHandler()
00078     {
00079         handleTerminate();
00080     }
00081 
00082     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00083     template<> Root* Singleton<Root>::ms_Singleton = 0;
00084     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00085     Root::Root()
00086     {
00087         // First create new exception handler
00088         SET_TERM_HANDLER;
00089 
00090         // superclass will do singleton checking
00091         String msg;
00092 
00093         // Init
00094         mActiveRenderer = 0;
00095         mVersion = "0.98b";
00096 
00097         // Create log manager and default log file
00098         mLogManager = new LogManager();
00099         mLogManager->createLog("Ogre.log", true, true);
00100 
00101         // Dynamic library manager
00102         mDynLibManager = new DynLibManager();
00103 
00104         mArchiveManager = new ArchiveManager();
00105 
00106         // Create SceneManager enumerator (note - will be managed by singleton)
00107         mSceneManagerEnum = new SceneManagerEnumerator();
00108 
00109         // ..material manager
00110         mMaterialManager = new MaterialManager();
00111 
00112         // ..particle system manager
00113         mParticleManager = new ParticleSystemManager();
00114 
00115         // Platform manager
00116         mPlatformManager = new PlatformManager();
00117 
00118         ArchiveManager::getSingleton().addArchiveFactory( new ZipArchiveFactory );
00119 
00120         Codec *pCodec;
00121         pCodec = new PNGCodec;
00122         Codec::registerCodec( pCodec );
00123         pCodec = new JPEGCodec;
00124         Codec::registerCodec( pCodec );
00125         pCodec = new TGACodec;
00126         Codec::registerCodec( pCodec );
00127         pCodec = new JPGCodec;
00128         Codec::registerCodec( pCodec );
00129 
00130         // Load plugins
00131         loadPlugins();        
00132 
00133         mLogManager->logMessage("*-*-* OGRE Initialising");
00134         msg = "*-*-* Version " + mVersion;
00135         mLogManager->logMessage(msg);
00136 
00137         // Create new Math object (will be managed by singleton)
00138         mMath = new Math();
00139 
00140 
00141         // Can't create controller manager until initialised
00142         mControllerManager = 0;
00143 
00144         // Always add the local folder as first resource search path for all resources
00145         addResourceLocation("./", "FileSystem");
00146 
00147         // Seed random number generator for future use
00148         srand((unsigned)time(0));
00149 
00150 
00151     }
00152 
00153     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00154     Root::~Root()
00155     {
00156         shutdown();
00157         delete mSceneManagerEnum;
00158 
00159         delete mArchiveManager;
00160 
00161         unloadPlugins();
00162 
00163         delete mMaterialManager;
00164         if (mControllerManager)
00165             delete mControllerManager;
00166         delete mMath;
00167         delete mPlatformManager;
00168         delete mDynLibManager;
00169         delete mLogManager;
00170     }

00172     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00173     void Root::saveConfig(void)
00174     {
00175         ::FILE *fp;
00176         char rec[100];
00177 
00178         fp = fopen("ogre.cfg", "w");
00179         if (!fp)
00180             Except(Exception::ERR_CANNOT_WRITE_TO_FILE, "Cannot create settings file.",
00181             "Root::saveConfig");
00182 
00183         if (mActiveRenderer)
00184         {
00185             sprintf(rec, "Render System\t%s\n", mActiveRenderer->getName().c_str());
00186             fputs(rec, fp);
00187 
00188             ConfigOptionMap& opts = mActiveRenderer->getConfigOptions();
00189             for(  ConfigOptionMap::iterator pOpt = opts.begin(); pOpt != opts.end(); ++pOpt )
00190             {
00191                 sprintf(rec, "%s\t%s\n", pOpt->first.c_str(),
00192                     pOpt->second.currentValue.c_str());
00193                 fputs(rec, fp);
00194             }
00195         }
00196         else
00197         {
00198             strcpy(rec, "Render System\t ");
00199             fputs(rec, fp);
00200         }
00201 
00202         fclose(fp);
00203 
00204     }
00205     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00206     bool Root::restoreConfig(void)
00207     {
00208         // Restores configuration from saved state
00209         // Returns true if a valid saved configuration is
00210         //   available, and false if no saved config is
00211         //   stored, or if there has been a problem
00212         ::FILE *fp;
00213         char rec[100], *ret;
00214         String optName, optVal;
00215         RenderSystemList::iterator pRend;
00216 
00217         fp = fopen("ogre.cfg", "r");
00218         if (!fp)
00219             // no config file
00220             return false;
00221 
00222         // Get render system
00223         ret = fgets(rec, 100, fp);
00224         // Tokenise on tab
00225         optName = strtok(rec, "\t");
00226         optVal = strtok(NULL, "\n");
00227 
00228         if (optName == "Render System")
00229         {
00230             pRend = getAvailableRenderers()->begin();
00231             while (pRend != getAvailableRenderers()->end())
00232             {
00233                 String rName = (*pRend)->getName();
00234                 if (rName == optVal)
00235                     break;
00236                 pRend++;
00237             }
00238 
00239             if (pRend == getAvailableRenderers()->end())
00240             {
00241                 // Unrecognised render system
00242                 fclose(fp);
00243                 return false;
00244             }
00245 
00246             setRenderSystem(*pRend);
00247 
00248             // Load render system options
00249             ret = fgets(rec, 100, fp);
00250             while (ret != NULL)
00251             {
00252                 // Tokenise on tab
00253                 optName = strtok(rec, "\t");
00254                 optVal = strtok(NULL, "\n");
00255                 mActiveRenderer->setConfigOption(optName, optVal);
00256                 ret = fgets(rec, 100, fp);
00257             }
00258         }
00259         else
00260         {
00261             // Render system should be first entry - error
00262             fclose(fp);
00263             return false;
00264 
00265         }
00266         // Successful load
00267         fclose(fp);
00268         return true;
00269 
00270     }

00272     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00273     bool Root::showConfigDialog(void)
00274     {
00275         // Displays the standard config dialog
00276         // Will use stored defaults if available
00277         ConfigDialog* dlg;
00278         bool isOk;
00279 
00280         dlg = mPlatformManager->createConfigDialog();
00281 
00282         isOk = dlg->display();
00283 
00284         mPlatformManager->destroyConfigDialog(dlg);
00285 
00286         return isOk;
00287 
00288     }

00299     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00300     void Root::setRenderSystem(RenderSystem* system)
00301     {
00302         // Sets the active rendering system
00303         // Can be called direct or will be called by
00304         //   standard config dialog
00305 
00306         // Is there already an active renderer?
00307         // If so, disable it and init the new one
00308         if( mActiveRenderer && mActiveRenderer != system )
00309         {
00310             mActiveRenderer->shutdown();
00311         }
00312 
00313         mActiveRenderer = system;
00314         // Tell scene managers
00315         SceneManagerEnumerator::getSingleton().setRenderSystem(system);
00316 
00317     }
00318     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00319     void Root::addRenderSystem(RenderSystem *newRend)
00320     {
00321         mRenderers.push_back(newRend);
00322     }
00323     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00324     void Root::setSceneManager(SceneType sType, SceneManager *sm)
00325     {
00326         SceneManagerEnumerator::getSingleton().setSceneManager(sType, sm);
00327     }

00329     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00330     RenderSystem* Root::getRenderSystem(void)
00331     {
00332         // Gets the currently active renderer
00333         return mActiveRenderer;
00334 
00335     }

00337     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00338     RenderWindow* Root::initialise(bool autoCreateWindow)
00339     {
00340         if (!mActiveRenderer)
00341             Except(Exception::ERR_NO_RENDERSYSTEM_SELECTED,
00342             "Cannot initialise - no render "
00343             "system has been selected.", "Root::initialise");
00344 
00345         mControllerManager = new ControllerManager();
00346 
00347         // Parse all material scripts
00348         mMaterialManager->parseAllSources();
00349 
00350 
00351         RenderWindow *retWin =  mActiveRenderer->initialise(autoCreateWindow);
00352 
00353         if (autoCreateWindow)
00354         {
00355             // Init particle systems manager
00356             mParticleManager->_initialise();
00357         }
00358 
00359         return retWin;
00360 
00361     }
00362     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00363     String Root::getErrorDescription(long errorNumber)
00364     {
00365 
00366         // Pass to render system
00367         if (mActiveRenderer)
00368             return mActiveRenderer->getErrorDescription(errorNumber);
00369         else
00370             return "";
00371 
00372     }

00409     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00410     void Root::shutdown(void)
00411     {
00412         if (mActiveRenderer)
00413         {
00414             mActiveRenderer->shutdown();
00415             mActiveRenderer = 0;
00416         }
00417 
00418         mLogManager->logMessage("*-*-* OGRE Shutdown");
00419 
00420 
00421     }

00427     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00428     void Root::loadPlugins( const String& pluginsfile )
00429     {
00430         StringVector pluginList;
00431         String pluginDir;
00432         ConfigFile cfg;
00433         DynLib* lib;
00434         cfg.load( pluginsfile );
00435 
00436         pluginDir = cfg.getSetting("PluginFolder");
00437         pluginList = cfg.getMultiSetting("Plugin");
00438 
00439         if (pluginDir == "")
00440         {
00441             char cwd[255];
00442             getcwd(cwd, 254);
00443             Except(Exception::ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND, "Unable to determine plugins folder, plugins.cfg not found in " + String(cwd),
00444                 "Root::loadPlugins");
00445         }
00446 
00447         char szBuffer[260];
00448         getcwd( szBuffer, 259 );
00449         chdir( pluginDir.c_str() );
00450 
00451         for( StringVector::iterator it = pluginList.begin(); it != pluginList.end(); ++it )
00452         {
00453             // Load plugin library
00454             lib = DynLibManager::getSingleton().load( *it );
00455             // Store for later unload
00456             mPluginLibs.push_back(lib);
00457 
00458             // Call startup function
00459             DLL_START_PLUGIN pFunc = (DLL_START_PLUGIN)lib->getSymbol("dllStartPlugin");
00460 
00461             if (!pFunc)
00462                 Except(Exception::ERR_ITEM_NOT_FOUND, "Cannot find symbol dllStartPlugin in library " + *it,
00463                     "Root::loadPlugins");
00464             pFunc();
00465         }
00466 
00467         chdir( szBuffer );
00468     }
00469     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00470     void Root::unloadPlugins(void)
00471     {
00472         std::vector<DynLib*>::iterator i;
00473 
00474         for (i = mPluginLibs.begin(); i != mPluginLibs.end(); ++i)
00475         {
00476             // Call plugin shutdown
00477             DLL_STOP_PLUGIN pFunc = (DLL_STOP_PLUGIN)(*i)->getSymbol("dllStopPlugin");
00478             pFunc();
00479             // Unload library & destroy
00480             DynLibManager::getSingleton().unload((Resource*)*i);
00481             delete *i;
00482 
00483         }
00484 
00485         mPluginLibs.clear();
00486 
00487     }
00488     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00489     void Root::addResourceLocation(const String& name, const String& locType, ResourceType resType)
00490     {
00491         switch(resType)
00492         {
00493         case RESTYPE_ALL:
00494             ResourceManager::addCommonArchiveEx(name, locType);
00495             break;
00496         case RESTYPE_TEXTURES:
00497             TextureManager::getSingleton().addArchiveEx(name, locType);
00498             break;
00499         case RESTYPE_MODELS:
00500             MeshManager::getSingleton().addArchiveEx(name, locType);
00501             break;
00502 
00503         }
00504     }
00505     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00506     void Root::convertColourValue(const ColourValue& colour, unsigned long* pDest)
00507     {
00508         assert(mActiveRenderer != 0);
00509         mActiveRenderer->convertColourValue(colour, pDest);
00510     }
00511     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00512     RenderWindow* Root::createRenderWindow(const String &name, int width, int height, int colourDepth,
00513                 bool fullScreen, int left, int top, bool depthBuffer,RenderWindow* parentWindowHandle)
00514     {
00515         if (!mActiveRenderer)
00516         {
00517             Except(Exception::ERR_NO_RENDERSYSTEM_SELECTED,
00518             "Cannot create window - no render "
00519             "system has been selected.", "Root::createRenderWindow");
00520         }
00521         RenderWindow* ret;
00522         ret = mActiveRenderer->createRenderWindow(name, width, height, colourDepth, fullScreen, left, top,
00523             depthBuffer, parentWindowHandle);
00524 
00525         // Initialisation for classes dependent on first window created
00526         static bool firstOne = true;
00527         if (firstOne)
00528         {
00529             // Init particle systems manager
00530             mParticleManager->_initialise();
00531             firstOne = false;
00532         }
00533 
00534         return ret;
00535 
00536     }
00537     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00538     void Root::destroyRenderWindow(RenderWindow* pWin)
00539     {
00540         if (!mActiveRenderer)
00541         {
00542             Except(Exception::ERR_NO_RENDERSYSTEM_SELECTED,
00543             "Cannot create window - no render "
00544             "system has been selected.", "Root::destroyRenderWindow");
00545         }
00546 
00547         mActiveRenderer->destroyRenderWindow(pWin);
00548     }
00549     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00550     void Root::destroyRenderWindow(const String &name)
00551     {
00552         if (!mActiveRenderer)
00553         {
00554             Except(Exception::ERR_NO_RENDERSYSTEM_SELECTED,
00555             "Cannot create window - no render "
00556             "system has been selected.", "Root::destroyRenderWindow");
00557         }
00558         mActiveRenderer->destroyRenderWindow(name);
00559     }
